Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to a sales tax exemption for certain fundraising organized by school-based volunteer organizations
Summary: Grants a sales and compensating use tax exemption for goods under $2 sold for fundraising organized by school-based volunteer organizations.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to granting a sales and compensating use tax exemption for certain goods sold for the purpose of fundraising organized by school-based volunteer organizations
